modName: GHOSU - Zahkrii Do Dovahkiin - MODDERS RESOURCE
summary:
This is an UNFINISHED MOD, free to use modders resource - based on this thread:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/937167-zahkrii-do-dovahkiin-hidden-dlc-dragonborn-sword
descriptionHtml:
GHOSU - Zahkrii Do Dovahkiin

This is an UNFINISHED MOD, free to use modders resource - based on this thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/937167-zahkrii-do-dovahkiin-hidden-dlc-dragonborn-sword]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/937167-zahkrii-do-dovahkiin-hidden-dlc-dragonborn-sword[/url]

[youtube]vDBnT_zx_CM[/youtube]

The normal sword models without shout effect might work for regular users as well, see below!

I had to quit modding half a year ago, though i\'m releasing my WIP files of this mod - NOTHING IS FINISHED, i guess the current state is around 70% done but maybe someone wants to continue my work OR use some files.

The data and CK form structure is quite chaotic, i have my own way of modding and it would take hours to sort it out for the public - time i can\'t spend.
I just had a few minutes to upload the whole stuff, some CK forms and files are just placeholders and/or not finished, texture/3D topology needs some tuning, the 1h glow effect is not implented yet and so on. PLEASE don\'t download if you have no clue \'bout modding, i can\'t fix/finish is or explain details since i\'m quite busy.

If you are just a regular user you might (!) install it like a common mod - and MAYBE (!) the sword models work. Afaik it should work without any DLC/Addons. Open console and enter HELP ZAHKRII as shown in the screenshot, afterwards enter PLAYER.ADDITEM CODE 1   . The code is listed next to each item\'s name and 1 = amount

I guess the models work BUT you should avoid using the shout/glow effect since it\'s not finished. The mod was created 6 months ago with an old version of CK/game, so i\'m not even sure if it works. No time to try it so i would recommend only to download if you are an experienced modder and know how to handle it, i don\'t guarantee anything!

Sorry that i couldn\'t finish it but real life first...maybe someone can use my files, won\'t harm anyone and it\'s better than nothing so please don\'t complain if you can\'t use it - this is no final mod.

Greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
